content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Baihu Li from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Hello Mister Li, thank you for coming to see the apartment. I am looking to maximize my gains, so I would like to discuss the rental price with you. What is your offer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to accept your offer of 700 Euros per month.

What is your counteroffer?
name: Baihu Li from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Mister Li. However, I am looking to get the highest price possible for this apartment. Based on my calculations, I am willing to accept an offer of 800 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. I can offer you 750 Euros per month. Can we reach an agreement on that?

What is your counteroffer?

If not, I would like to terminate the negotiation.
name: Baihu Li from China

content: Thank you for your counteroffer, Mister Li. However, I am still looking for a higher price. I am willing to accept an offer of 850 Euros per month. If we cannot reach an agreement on this, I will have to terminate the negotiation.
name: Heinrich Heine
